statements: SELECT * FROM ticketing_transactions;
SELECT payment_info, seat_assignment FROM ticketing_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_info FROM ticketing_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ticketing_transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_info, seat_assignment FROM ticketing_transactions WHERE transaction_id > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_info, seat_assignment FROM ticketing_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ticketing_transactions WHERE seat_assignment LIKE '%A%';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_info FROM ticketing_transactions WHERE transaction_id > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM ticketing_transactions;
SELECT DISTINCT seat_assignment FROM ticketing_transactions ORDER BY seat_assignment ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_information
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_information ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM seat_assignment GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT seat_number, status FROM seat_assignment WHERE status='occupied'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, customer_id FROM payment_information WHERE customer_id = 1234 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT seat_number, status, customer_id FROM seat_assignment WHERE status = 'assigned' ORDER BY seat_number ASC;

SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_information WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date < '2022-07-01' AND customer_id IN (5678, 9876) ORDER BY customer_id ASC, payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM seat_assignments WHERE section = 'VIP' ORDER BY seat_number DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY user_id HAVING ticket_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM seat_assignments WHERE section = 'VIP' AND assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT t.user_id, s.section FROM ticket_sales t INNER JOIN seat_assignments s ON t.seat_assignment_id = s.assignment_id
SELECT t.user_id, p.payment_date FROM ticket_sales t INNER JOIN payment_transactions p ON t.transaction_id = p.transaction_id WHERE p.amount >= 500 ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_info;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment_info ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM payment_info WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM seat_assignments WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM payment_info ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM seat_assignments WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY assigned_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE payment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Payment;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT venue_id, name, location FROM Venue WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Event ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payment WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payment WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payment ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT Ticket.ticket_id, Ticket.seat_number, Ticket.ticket_type, Customer.name FROM Ticket JOIN Customer ON Ticket.ticket_id = Customer.customer_id;
SELECT Event.event_id, Event.event_name, Venue.name FROM Event JOIN Venue ON Event.location = Venue.location;
